Question.Subject: I have a website through Yahoo and I can't add tabs within a page?
Question.Content: I have website and I can't add tabs, how do I add tabs on a page through yahoo? I was thinking about switching to another web host. I've seen godaddy and it seems easier to design a webpage through them. Are there any other recommendations for switching to antoher web host or is there a way through yahoo that I can add tabs to a site page?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hello On this page you'll get the requested information.
http://help.yahoo.com/sbc/tutorials/cl3/c3_tabs1.html

Answer.Content:
Hello On this page you'll get the requested information.
